plot: Though it never made it to an actual weekly series, two pilots were shot between 1980 and 1981 for this sitcom in which Dracula moves his family from Transylvania to the USA.
plot_en: Though it never made it to an actual weekly series, two pilots were shot between 1980 and 1981 for this sitcom in which Dracula moves his family from Transylvania to the USA.
plot_es: Though it never made it to an actual weekly series, two pilots were shot between 1980 and 1981 for this sitcom in which Dracula moves his family from Transylvania to the USA.
title: Mr. and Mrs. Dracula
